channel.title: Oleg Nenashev on Community Over Code Europe

item.title: Mentorship programs. Growing new team and community leaders
item.description: Mentorship and outreach programs are often considered as side projects. Although they are a nice way to spend time and have some fun, one may say they rarely add new long-term contributors to your company project or a community. Is it true? Is it even the main goal? Or is it about team bonding and growing new maintainers and community leaders? Letâ€™s talk about organizing mentorship programs so that they help to grow your current community and contributors.
